      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkButtonHover()
      Checks if the position of the mouse is hovering over any buttons and fills in the hovered button with a grey background if it is not currently active

      Check if there is any tower in the tile that the mouse is hovering over.

      Checks if there is any tower in the tile that the mouse is hovering over.
      void createTower(int colPressed, int rowPressed, java.lang.String towerType)
      Takes in a coordinate and tower type and checks if the space is empty and if the user has enough mana and creates a tower.
      void draw()
      Draw all elements in the game by current frame and runs the code twice if fastForward is active
      void drawButtons()
      Draws the buttons of the individual toggles
      void drawFireball(Fireball fireball)
      Draws the fireball created by shooters
      void drawGUI()
      Draws the GUI of the game including the buttons, background and mana bar
      void drawHouse()
      Draws the wizard's house on top of the map and any surrounding tiles
      void drawLayout()
      Draws the layout of the map based on the 2D char array of the layout created by getLayout() using imported images
      void drawLose()
      Draws the lose text on the screen
      void drawMonster(Monster monster)
      Draws a monster object based on its position and type and draws it's HP bar above the sprite.
      void drawMoveMonsters()
      Loops through all the monsters in the monsterList and increases their dyingframe count if they are dying.

      Draws the ring created by sprayers
      void drawTower(Tower tower)
      Draws the tower based on its coordinates on the map and the upgrades that the tower currently has
      void drawUpgrades(Tower tower)
      Draws extra icons for upgrades depending on the levels of the tower
      void drawWaveMana()
      Draws the mana bar of the wizard and draws the timer until the next wave starts
      void drawWin()
      Draws the win text on the screen

    • Method Detail

      • settings

        public void settings()
        Initialise the setting of the window size.

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Load all resources such as images. Initialise the elements such as the player, enemies and map elements.

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed()
        Toggles options in game if certain keys are pressed, to alter game function

      • mousePressed

        public void mousePressed(MouseEvent e)
        Checks if the user has clicked a button to toggle it or clicked a tower to try and upgrade it
        Parameters:
        e - A mouseEvent that occurs

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Draw all elements in the game by current frame and runs the code twice if fastForward is active

      • drawTower

        public void drawTower(Tower tower)
        Draws the tower based on its coordinates on the map and the upgrades that the tower currently has
        Parameters:
        tower - the tower with upgrades to be drawn

      • createTower

        public void createTower(int colPressed,
                        int rowPressed,
                        java.lang.String towerType)
        Takes in a coordinate and tower type and checks if the space is empty and if the user has enough mana and creates a tower. Also upgrades the tower if the user has the upgrade toggles active and enough mana
        Parameters:
        colPressed - the column chosen by the mouseEvent
        rowPressed - the row chosen by the mouseEvent
        towerType - the type of tower that is toggled to be built

      • upgradeTower

        public void upgradeTower(Tower tower)
        Takes in a tower object and upgrades the tower depending on what upgrade toggles are active. Goes from top to bottom and upgrades them one by one if the user has enough mana. If the user has insufficient mana, only the upgrades they have enough mana for will be upgraded
        Parameters:
        tower - the tower to be upgraded

      • tryShoot

        public void tryShoot(Tower tower)
        Takes in a tower object and checks if there are any monsters in range If there are any enemies in range, it spawns the respective projectile depending on what type of tower it is
        Parameters:
        tower - the tower attempting to shoot

      • drawUpgrades

        public void drawUpgrades(Tower tower)
        Draws extra icons for upgrades depending on the levels of the tower
        Parameters:
        tower - the tower to draw upgrades on

      • drawRing

        public void drawRing(Ring ring)
        Draws the ring created by sprayers
        Parameters:
        ring - the ring object to be drawn

      • moveRing

        public void moveRing(Ring ring)
        Changes the position of rings created by sprayers
        Parameters:
        ring - the ring object to be moved

      • drawFireball

        public void drawFireball(Fireball fireball)
        Draws the fireball created by shooters
        Parameters:
        fireball - the fireball object to be drawn

      • moveFireball

        public void moveFireball(Fireball fireball)
        Changes the position of fireballs created by shooters
        Parameters:
        fireball - the fireball object to be moved

      • drawMonster

        public void drawMonster(Monster monster)
        Draws a monster object based on its position and type and draws it's HP bar above the sprite.
        Parameters:
        monster - the monster to be drawn

      • moveMonster

        public void moveMonster(Monster monster)
        Changes the position of a monster object
        Parameters:
        monster - the monster to be moved

      • drawMoveMonsters

        public void drawMoveMonsters()
        Loops through all the monsters in the monsterList and increases their dyingframe count if they are dying. It draws all alive monsters and mvoes them if they are alive and not dying

      • spawnRandomMonster

        public void spawnRandomMonster()
        Spawns a random monster from the current wave's monster list that has not been spawned yet

      • getLayoutData

        public char[][] getLayoutData(java.lang.String layoutFile)
        Uses the layoutFile name to retrieve the map data inside and stores it as a 2D char array
        Parameters:
        layoutFile - a string with the level path
        Returns:
        a 2D char array representing the map

      • startNextWave

        public void startNextWave()
        starts the first wave if game has just started, otherwise starts the next wave and also gets the timer until next wave starts if it is not the last wave

      • checkTowerRangeHover

        public void checkTowerRangeHover()
        Check if there is any tower in the tile that the mouse is hovering over. If there is a tower, it draws a circle representing the tower's range

      • checkTowerUpgradeHover

        public void checkTowerUpgradeHover()
        Checks if there is any tower in the tile that the mouse is hovering over. If there is a tower and any upgrade toggle is active, it draws a white box in the bottom right of the GUI representing the cost of the tower upgrades

      • checkButtonHover

        public void checkButtonHover()
        Checks if the position of the mouse is hovering over any buttons and fills in the hovered button with a grey background if it is not currently active

      • drawLayout

        public void drawLayout()
        Draws the layout of the map based on the 2D char array of the layout created by getLayout() using imported images

      • drawHouse

        public void drawHouse()
        Draws the wizard's house on top of the map and any surrounding tiles

      • drawGUI

        public void drawGUI()
        Draws the GUI of the game including the buttons, background and mana bar

      • drawButtons

        public void drawButtons()
        Draws the buttons of the individual toggles

      • drawWaveMana

        public void drawWaveMana()
        Draws the mana bar of the wizard and draws the timer until the next wave starts

      • drawWin

        public void drawWin()
        Draws the win text on the screen

      • drawLose

        public void drawLose()
        Draws the lose text on the screen

      • getFull

        public boolean getFull(int col,
                       int row)
        Check if a tile already has a tower on it
        Parameters:
        col - column of the tile to check
        row - row of the tile to check
        Returns:
        boolean which represents if the tile has a tower already

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • rotateImageByDegrees

        public PImage rotateImageByDegrees(PImage pimg,
                                   double angle)
        Source: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/37758061/rotate-a-buffered-image-in-java
        Parameters:
        pimg - The image to be rotated
        angle - between 0 and 360 degrees
        Returns:
        the new rotated image
